00029 class simbio_date
00030 {
00031     /* ALL METHODS DATE ARGUMENT(s) IS ASSUMED USING YYYY-MM-DD format */
00032 
00041     public static function getNextDate($int_day_num = 1, $str_start_date = '', $str_date_format = 'Y-m-d')
00042     {
00043         if ($int_day_num < 1) { return $str_start_date; }
00044         if (!$str_start_date) {
00045             return date($str_date_format, mktime(0, 0, 0, intval(date('n')), (intval(date('j'))+$int_day_num), intval(date('Y')) ) );
00046         } else if ($_parsed_date = @date_parse($str_start_date)) {
00047             return date($str_date_format, mktime(0, 0, 0, $_parsed_date['month'], $_parsed_date['day']+$int_day_num, $_parsed_date['year'] ) );
00048         } else {
00049             return null;
00050         }
00051     }
00052 
00053 
00062     public static function getPrevDate($int_day_num = 1, $str_start_date = '', $str_date_format = 'Y-m-d')
00063     {
00064         if ($int_day_num < 1) { return $str_start_date; }
00065         if (!$str_start_date) {
00066             return date($str_date_format, mktime(0, 0, 0, intval(date('n')), (intval(date('j'))-$int_day_num), intval(date('Y')) ) );
00067         } else if ($_parsed_date = @date_parse($str_start_date)) {
00068             return date($str_date_format, mktime(0, 0, 0, $_parsed_date['month'], $_parsed_date['day']-$int_day_num, $_parsed_date['year'] ) );
00069         } else {
00070             return null;
00071         }
00072     }

00082     public static function calcDay($str_start_date, $str_end_date)
00083     {
00084         $_parsed_start_date = @date_parse($str_start_date);
00085         $_parsed_end_date = @date_parse($str_end_date);
00086         $_start_mktime = mktime(0, 0, 0, $_parsed_start_date['month'], $_parsed_start_date['day'], $_parsed_start_date['year']);
00087         $_end_mktime = mktime(0, 0, 0, $_parsed_end_date['month'], $_parsed_end_date['day'], $_parsed_end_date['year']);
00088         $_mksec = $_end_mktime-$_start_mktime;
00089         return abs(intval($_mksec/(3600*24)));
00090     }
00091 
00092 
00102     public static function countHolidayBetween($str_start_date, $str_end_date, $array_holiday_dayname = array('Sun'), $array_holiday_date = array())
00103     {
00104         $_holiday_count = 0;
00105         $_one_day = 3600*24;
00106         $_parsed_start_date = @date_parse($str_start_date);
00107         $_parsed_end_date = @date_parse($str_end_date);
00108         $_start_mktime = mktime(0, 0, 0, $_parsed_start_date['month'], $_parsed_start_date['day'], $_parsed_start_date['year']);
00109         $_end_mktime = mktime(0, 0, 0, $_parsed_end_date['month'], $_parsed_end_date['day'], $_parsed_end_date['year']);
00110         while ($_start_mktime <= $_end_mktime) {
00111             if (in_array(date('D', $_start_mktime), $array_holiday_dayname) OR in_array(date('Y-m-d', $_start_mktime), $array_holiday_date)) {
00112                 $_holiday_count += 1;
00113             }
00114             $_start_mktime += $_one_day;
00115         }
00116 
00117         return $_holiday_count;
00118     }
00119 
00120 
00127     public static function compareDates()
00128     {
00129         if (func_num_args() < 1) {
00130             return null;
00131         } else if (func_num_args() == 2) {
00132             // get value of method arguments
00133             $date1 = func_get_arg(0);
00134             $date2 = func_get_arg(1);
00135             // check if $date1 and $date2 is same
00136             if ($date1 == $date2) {
00137                 return null;
00138             }
00139             // get the UNIX timestamp of date
00140             $_parsed_date1 = date_parse($date1);
00141             $_parsed_date2 = date_parse($date2);
00142             $timestamp1 = mktime(0, 0, 0, $_parsed_date1['month'], $_parsed_date1['day'], $_parsed_date1['year']);
00143             $timestamp2 = mktime(0, 0, 0, $_parsed_date2['month'], $_parsed_date2['day'], $_parsed_date2['year']);
00144             if ($timestamp1 > $timestamp2) {
00145                 return $date1;
00146             } else {
00147                 return $date2;
00148             }
00149         }
00150 
00151         $func_args = func_get_args();
00152         $latest = func_get_arg(0);
00153         foreach ($func_args as $args) {
00154             $latest = self::compareDates($latest, $args);
00155         }
00156 
00157         return $latest;
00158     }
00159 
00160 
00169     public static function getNextDateNotHoliday($str_date, $array_holiday_dayname = array(), $array_holiday_date = array())
00170     {
00171         // if array dayname and date is empty
00172         if (!$array_holiday_dayname AND !$array_holiday_date) {
00173             return $str_date;
00174         }
00175         // parse date
00176         $_parsed_date = @date_parse($str_date);
00177         // get dayname of $str_date
00178         $dayname = date('D', mktime(0, 0, 0, $_parsed_date['month'], $_parsed_date['day'], $_parsed_date['year']));
00179         // check date array first
00180         if ($array_holiday_date) {
00181             $d = false;
00182             foreach ($array_holiday_date as $_idx=>$_each_date) {
00183                 if ($str_date == $_each_date) {
00184                     $d = true;
00185                     unset($array_holiday_date[$_idx]);
00186                 }
00187             }
00188             if ($d) {
00189                 $_str_date_next = self::getNextDate(1, $str_date);
00190                 return self::getNextDateNotHoliday($_str_date_next, $array_holiday_dayname, $array_holiday_date);
00191             } else {
00192                 // check dayname
00193                 if (!in_array($dayname, $array_holiday_dayname)) {
00194                     return $str_date;
00195                 } else {
00196                     $_str_date_next = self::getNextDate(1, $str_date);
00197                     return self::getNextDateNotHoliday($_str_date_next, $array_holiday_dayname, $array_holiday_date);
00198                 }
00199             }
00200         } else {
00201             // check dayname
00202             if (!in_array($dayname, $array_holiday_dayname)) {
00203                 return $str_date;
00204             } else {
00205                 $_str_date_next = self::getNextDate(1, $str_date);
00206                 return self::getNextDateNotHoliday($_str_date_next, $array_holiday_dayname);
00207             }
00208         }
00209     }
00210 }
